name: Five Nights With Fat Herobrine
description:
A fat version of herobrine has been lately breaking in and stealing from an taco restaurant,a security guard (You) has been hired to stop him from stealing ingredients and tacos.But the main problem is that fat herobrine isn't the only problem, some other employees will need help during the night, and if you don't help them, they will kill you

Images taken from minecraft and from the fat herobrine series

Sounds are taken from stock sound effects and from the original fnaf games
